scripts.dev: npx supabase start && npx supabase db push --local && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.db:gentypes: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > supabase/types.d.ts && biome format --fix ./supabase/types.d.ts && cp supabase/types.d.ts apps/shared/src/types/database.d.ts && npx supabase gen types typescript --local --schema public,private > supabase/types-server.d.ts && biome format --fix ./supabase/types-server.d.ts && cp supabase/types-server.d.ts apps/shared/src/types/database-server.d.ts
scripts.db:checktypes: pnpm run db:gentypes && git diff --exit-code supabase/types.d.ts && git diff --exit-code supabase/types-server.d.ts
